sentences.en: Become well - educated through self - study .
Children should be educated in a correct [ proper ] way .
Correct speech is an earmark of the educated man.
sentences.cn: 正确的谈吐是受教育者的特征.

sentences.en: He is more highly educated, with a PhD in Chemistry.
sentences.cn: 他受过更高的教育，拥有化学博士学位。

sentences.en: He patiently educated himself in this subject.
sentences.cn: 他坚持不懈地自修这门学科.

sentences.en: He was educated at a co-ed comprehensive school.
sentences.cn: 他就读于一所男女生同校的综合性学校。

sentences.en: He was educated at Balliol College, Oxford.
sentences.cn: 他上的是牛津大学的贝利奥尔学院。

sentences.en: He was educated for the law.

sentences.cn: 他是受过普林斯顿大学教育的得克萨斯人。

sentences.en: Old superstitions seem incredible to educated people.
sentences.cn: 旧的迷信对于受过教育的人来说是不可思议的.

sentences.en: People live longer nowadays, and they are better educated.
sentences.cn: 当今，人们越来越长寿，受教育程度也提高了。

sentences.en: She was educated — after a fashion — at home.
sentences.cn: 她算得上是受过教育——家庭教育。

sentences.en: She was privately educated at schools in Ireland and Paris.
sentences.cn: 她在爱尔兰和巴黎的学校接受过私立教育。

sentences.en: She was well educated in literature at a university.
sentences.cn: 她在大学里受到良好的文学方面的教育.

sentences.en: The public should be educated to use resources more effectively.
sentences.cn: 应该教育大众更有效地使用资源.

words.tran_cn: 教育家；教育工作者；教师
训练；教导；培育（educate的过去分词形式）

trans.tran_cn: 有教育的，受过良好训练的
trans.tran_en: having been well taught and learned a lot

trans.tran_cn: 教育( educate的过去式和过去分词)，训练，教导，教养
